1111280.name: 9 Games, 2 Buttons
1111280.description:
9 Games, 2 Buttons!

In this arcade-style game you play up to 9 different minigames at the same time, at various game speeds! Levels 1 minute long, runs 10-30 minutes long. You use a pair of keys/controls for each game. Push for a new high score, sweat till your heart's content, trash talk your friends!

Features included:
9 unique minigames - From a last stand against zombies, to a standoff with a cowboy, to a mini platformer! Scramble to split your attention!
4 game difficulties - "Easy" "Normal" "Hard" "Tryhard"

Device local high score board for each difficulty.

Earn level skips by beating high stages.

Cute things like a menu gallery of images I like.

Pricing:

Game will be free until may.
